mapper.sql: ClassOfDiagnosis_Code, ClassOfDiagnosis_Name, Condition, DateOfDiagnosis, DaysOfTreatment, Description, DiagnosisIdentifier_Id, Doctor, EncounterIdentifier, FlagOfOperation, PatientIdentifier_Id, ProblemDiagnosis, ResultOfTreatment, SequenceNumberOfDiagnosis
mapper.select: select count(*) as count from Eval_ProblemDiagnosis where PatientIdentifier_Id = #{patientID,jdbcType=CHAR} and EncounterIdentifier=#{visitID,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from Eval_ProblemDiagnosis where PatientIdentifier_Id = #{patientID,jdbcType=CHAR} and EncounterIdentifier=#{visitID,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into Eval_ProblemDiagnosis (Guid, ClassOfDiagnosis_Code, ClassOfDiagnosis_Name, Condition, DateOfDiagnosis, DaysOfTreatment, Description, DiagnosisIdentifier_Id, Doctor, EncounterIdentifier, FlagOfOperation, PatientIdentifier_Id, ProblemDiagnosis, ResultOfTreatment, SequenceNumberOfDiagnosis ) values (newid(), #{classOfDiagnosisCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classOfDiagnosisName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{condition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateOfDiagnosis,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dayOfTreatment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diagnosisID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flagOfOperation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patientID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{problemDiagnosis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diagnosisNO,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
